errors.error_description: Referenced requirements file path is incorrect - should be requirements.txt not requirements_dev.txt
Installing requirements.txt after creating conda environment but before activating it, which is incorrect order
correction_candidates:
conda env create -f conda-environment.yml
conda activate winnf3

conda activate winnf3
python -m pip install -r ./requirements.txt

conda env create -f conda-environment.yml
python -m pip install -r ./requirements.txt
conda activate winnf3

conda create --name winnf3
conda activate winnf3
python -m pip install -r ./requirements.txt
errors.golden_answer:
conda env create -f conda-environment.yml
conda activate winnf3
